description: Mark Long likes to work up a serious sweat at the gym.  He maneuvers around the punching bag with methodical, calculated movements.  He's always focused and always giving 110%.  While taking a break, he notices something sticking out of an open locker.When he gets up close, he realizes it's a porno magazine.  A sticker on the locker identifies the owner as a person named 'Gabe.' Mark doesn't know Gabe, but he knows Gabe is careless with his porn.  A locker room stash should be hidden and protected, always within reach, but never visible to other gymbers (gym members).  Mark's teaching Gabe a lesson by stroking his big, hard cock while enjoying the dirty pictures, working up a hot, gooey load.  He wants to make sure that Gabe gets the message when he tries to open the magazine later.  Enjoy!
title: Mark Long
